solution_line_template: She found {num_quarters} quarters that are ${value_quarter} each so she found {num_quarters}*{value_quarter} = $<<{num_quarters}*{value_quarter}={quarters_total}>>{quarters_total}
She found {num_dimes} dimes that are ${value_dime} each so she found {num_dimes}*{value_dime} = $<<{num_dimes}*{value_dime}={dimes_total}>>{dimes_total}
She found {num_nickels} nickels that are ${value_nickel} each so she found {num_nickels}*{value_nickel} = $<<{num_nickels}*{value_nickel}={nickels_total}>>{nickels_total}
She found {num_pennies} pennies that are ${value_penny} each so she found {num_pennies}*{value_penny} = $<<{num_pennies}*{value_penny}={pennies_total}>>{pennies_total}
All total she found {quarters_total}+{dimes_total}+{nickels_total}+{pennies_total} = $3.00 in change
